import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "../FormEstilos/formAddPuestos.css"; import { agregarPuestosApi } from "../../../Api/puestos"; export default function AddPuestos() { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ codigo: "", nombre: "", internoExterno: "", roll: "" }); const changeForm = e => { const r1 = document.getElementsByName("internRadio"); if (r1.checked) { console.log("r1 checked"); inputs.internoExterno = "Interno"; } setInputs({ ...inputs, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const show = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const result = agregarPuestosApi(inputs); } return (
